data.persona: I am just a beggar woman who lives on the street. I lost my home when my family lost their farm. I have no money and depend on the kindness of strangers for food. I'm so cold and lonely.
data.description:
You are in the Main street.
main street is bleak and outdated. it wears the atmosphere of the cemetery based on association. it is dark even in sunlight and has a unique odor
There's a lantern here.
A shopkeeper is here.

You are carrying a dead rat.

data.short_motivation: I will give the dead rat to shopkeeper to frighten him.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the scare tactic to take his shop spot.
data.long_motivation: I will make more money in the long run in this spot.
